Page.Name: ExitConfirm
Page.Text: :3f658283b400f3df:Are you sure you want to leave the arena?

Page.Name: ForcedObserver
Page.Text: :3f6582835278680d:You may only observe this match because you have no champions in your inventory. To play a champions match, please purchase a champion from the merchants near the arena entrance.

Page.Name: SelectedChampion
Page.Text: :3f658283475c6d8f:The frozen magi once stalked the icy halls of Permafrost.
